Browse > Home / Letters to the Editor / Letter — Vote for Mark Cross for Sammamish City Council Letter — Vote for Mark Cross for Sammamish City Council 
October 8, 2015 
By Contributed 
NEW — 6:30 p.m. Oct. 8, 2015 
When you vote for Sammamish City Council Position 2, I ask you to choose the voice of reason and experience. 
While Mark Cross was a two-term council member and mayor, he supported and helped: find funding for cooperative sports fields on FieldTurf within the school districts at Eastlake and Skyline, integrate citizen participation for Ebright Creek Park plus create East Lake Sammamish Trail, instigate Sammamish Farmers Market and Music in the Parks, improve intersections for safety, like at Inglewood/East Lake Sammamish Parkway and impose significant traffic impact fees paid per house on new development. 
Due in part to work Mark did on the City Council for eight years, the city of Sammamish is financially very strong! Mark wishes to bring a sense of urgency now behind the plans for and completion of road projects. He wants collected dollars to be translated/converted into new transportation projects for handling congestion and improving traffic flow. 
His professional career includes more than 30 years working with permitting issues for cities and counties plus formal education as an urban planner. A longtime resident of Sammamish who has raised two children here, Mark cares for quality of life, trees and the environment. He knows and understands development codes for controlling growth versus having it control us. Smart use of codes helps preserve the flavor and character of our Sammamish, while permitting new choices like shopping at the Metropolitan Market. 
Staff at the city is incredibly busy dealing with all the new growth and construction. High turnover has occurred — now more than ever, our city needs solid experience and expertise! Mark desires to return to the City Council because he has developed excellent working relationships. Mark knows the code, procedures and processes, thus he will effectively work toward benefiting all Sammamish citizens. 
I have known Mark Cross personally for many years. He is a problem-solver who will find and make time to get community input and work hard to get things done. Vote for Mark Cross who will rededicate his time and experience to impact you for the better. 
Mary Wictor
